meanings.definition: Frank and unreserved in manner or speech.
meanings.sent1: She always speaks in an openhearted way, never hiding her true feelings.
meanings.sent2: The openhearted child shared his toys with everyone at the playground.
meanings.sent3: The openhearted puppy wagged its tail happily, greeting each visitor.
meanings.sent4: Her openhearted laughter filled the room with warmth and joy.
meanings.sent5: The openhearted welcome from the host made the guests feel instantly at home.

meanings.sent1: The openhearted donation helped many families in need.
meanings.sent2: She had an openhearted spirit, always willing to lend a helping hand.
meanings.sent3: The openhearted gesture of offering her umbrella to a stranger touched everyone's heart.
meanings.sent4: His openhearted support lifted the spirits of the entire team.
meanings.sent5: The openhearted act of forgiveness brought peace to their relationship.

meanings.definition: Showing or characterized by sincerity and honesty.
meanings.sent1: Her openhearted apology was heartfelt and genuine.
meanings.sent2: He appreciated her openhearted feedback, even though it was tough to hear.
meanings.sent3: The openhearted confession brought a sense of relief to the room.
meanings.sent4: In her openhearted letter, she poured out her true feelings without holding back.
meanings.sent5: The openhearted conversation between friends strengthened their bond.
